Outlook, a pilot program run from 2005-08 by Homeland Security and the Department of Defense which used sophisticated military radar along the border north of Spokane, Washington, to catch low-flying drug aircraft. Operation Outlook successfully identified air-related smuggling trends and patterns and organizations active in cross-border criminal activities along the Spokane sector, said a news release from Kirsten Gillibrand 's office. led Mayor Tom Leppert to ask for a city review of how council members hand out ceremonial gifts. "We don't condone it and clearly didn't approve it," Mayor Tom Leppert said of the Michael Vick award. It's unfortunate, and I would rather have not seen the situation. The key Dwaine Caraway gave Michael Vick was less than official, city officials explained. The official Dallas "keys" are made from gold or crystal and given out mostly to foreign dignitaries under strict protocol.

Chrysler Canada, which owes about$ 1.7 billion to the federal and Ontario governments, says it is the first time that the company is voluntarily paying extra money to workers beyond contractual obligations. It's in recognition of an extraordinary performance of the industrial system of Chrysler in 2010, chief executive officer Sergio Marchionne told analysts after U.S. parent Chrysler reported its year-end results.
